quiz.question: _____ air
quiz.explanation: 空气, 新鲜空气。I love breathing fresh air in the morning. 我喜欢早晨呼吸新鲜空气。

quiz.question: airline ______
quiz.explanation: 航空公司, 机票。I need to buy an airline ticket for tomorrow. 我需要买一张明天的机票。

quiz.question: airplane ____
quiz.explanation: 飞机, 飞机座位。I prefer an airplane seat by the window. 我更喜欢靠窗的飞机座位。

quiz.question: __ airport
quiz.explanation: 机场, 在机场。I will meet you at airport tomorrow. 我明天会在机场接你。

quiz.question: _____ album
quiz.explanation: 相册, 相册。She keeps a beautiful photo album of her travels. 她保存着一本美丽的旅行相册。

quiz.question: alien ____
quiz.explanation: 外星的, 外星生命。Scientists are searching for alien life in space. 科学家们正在太空中寻找外星生命。

quiz.question: ____ alive
quiz.explanation: 活着的, 保持活着。We must find water to stay alive. 我们必须找到水才能活下去。

quiz.question: all _____
quiz.explanation: 所有的, 好的;可以。Everything will be all right. 一切都会好起来的。

quiz.question: allow __
quiz.explanation: 允许, 允许。The rules allow to bring one bag. 规则允许携带一个包。

quiz.question: almost ____
quiz.explanation: 几乎, 几乎完成。The project is almost done now. 项目现在几乎完成了。
